info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 1:47PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Delta County through 215 PM MDT... At 146 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delta, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and pea size hail and very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orchard City. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 50 in Colorado between mile markers 68 and 76. Colorado 65 between mile markers 1 and 4. Colorado 92 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
